name: Quintessence
description:
Quintessence is a side-scrolling adventure platformer. Fight through a Cave of enemies to reach the goal all while your own magic is working against you, for the nature of magic is Chaos, you never know what it will do next.

P.s. This game will continue to be worked on by us, If you enjoy the concept please look out for an Update in the future.

Made in Unity with a two-person team.

Leafyxr  - Character, Enemy & UI art. Player, UI, AI, Spells Programming.

Petus 213 - Environment, Platforms & Obstacle Art. Pick-ups & Doors Programming.
